summary: Two young politicians cannot see eye to eye, resulting in the split of a political party into two factions.
cast: Siddharth Chandekar|Shubhangi Gokhale|Ujwala Jog|Neha Joshi|Santosh Juvekar|Chinmay Mandlekar|Sachit Patil|Tejashree Pradhan|Rajesh Shringarpure|Pushkar Shrotri|Sunil Tawde
title: Zenda
